assessments.status_rationale: No clear evidence that the S&P 500 has set three new all-time closing highs; headlines note strong megacaps and index additions (e.g., Robinhood, AppLovin) but do not confirm ATH closes. Window remains open through 2025-09-20.
CNBC highlights Broadcom’s strength and AMD’s drop, which could favor AVGO vs. SOXX, but the performance is defined from 2025-09-05 close to 2025-09-20 close. No period-end data yet.
Outcome depends on relative returns through 2025-09-30 close; no conclusive data provided.
No update on the Drewry WCI Shanghai–New York rate in today’s coverage; deadline is 2025-09-26.
Reports note tumbling Treasury yields and higher Fed cut odds, but no confirmation that the 10-Year Breakeven (T10YIE) closed at or below 2.20% on any day yet.
No NOAA SWPC report of an X1.0-class flare in the news; window remains open until 2025-10-31.
No mention of UKA Dec-2025 futures pricing; outcome requires a print at or above £44 by 2025-10-31.
